title: (x) Tea packaging: which font? - DTL Dorian {Akira}
content:
An attractive typeface used by Heath & Heather on the packaging of their specialty teas in the UK. Any takers?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100222005553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img944%20A_6253.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100222005553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img946%20B_5121.jpg)
author: George Tulloch

comments.content: Thanks, Akira! Yes, I was afraid that it was going to be something expensive . . .
